subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Browns Coach Mike Pettine will start quarterback Brian Hoyer against the Colts. Hoyer has led Cleveland to a 7-5 record but was replaced last Sunday in the fourth quarter of a loss to Buffalo.
snippet: Browns Coach Mike Pettine will start quarterback Brian Hoyer against the Colts. Hoyer has led Cleveland to a 7-5 record but was replaced last Sunday in the fourth quarter of a loss to Buffalo.
